long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never miss essential communications. Stay connected and informed with real-time updates from your Haystack intranet.

**Features**

Instant Notifications: 
Receive notifications directly on your browser whenever there are new updates, messages, or announcements posted on your organization’s Haystack Intranet.

Effortless Setup: 
Install and activate in seconds, with just a few clicks.

Streamlined Experience:
View and manage recent notifications directly from the browser extension. Mark updates as read, or click through to access the full content.

**How to Use**

Add the Haystack Chrome Extension from the Chrome Web Store.

Open the Haystack Chrome Extension and log in to your organization’s Haystack workspace.

Customize notification settings according to your preferences.

Use the Notification Center to stay informed and review important messages without breaking your workflow.

Important Note:
The Haystack Chrome Extension requires an active Haystack account.

**Support**

If you have any questions, feedback, or need assistance, please contact our support team at support@haystackteam.com.

**Permissions and Privacy** 

Notifications: 
This permission enables the extension to display notifications on your browser.

Privacy Policy:
We care about your privacy. For more information on how we collect, use, and protect your data, please refer to our privacy policy. 
https://www.haystackteam.com/legal/privacy
